name: The Other Side (Dan7shFR)
description:
'The Other Side' is my first game...

 I learn basic python for 2 week and try make my first game using godot for another two week... I'm still new to programming stuff so this game wasn't good but im still learning

Control:

Left = A

Right = D

Jump = SpaceBar

Down = S

Open Door = E

Reset = R

Made in 2 Week:

Game engine = Godot

Art = Librsprite

Music = LMMS 

Audio = Bfxr
